text:
foreseeti | https://www.foreseeti.com/ | Backend developer | Stockholm | Full-Time | Onsite

Hate boredom? Love a proper work-life balance? come join me at foreseeti.

foreseeti is looking for our next developer to join our team. We're building software for automated it risk analysis assessments, one of the leaders in a new and exciting field.

We're a small team so everyone needs to pitch in at various parts, more looking for the right person who can pick things up quickly than the right experience.

We work in java, python/flask, js/react, c++, opencl so it's a fairly broad range of tech. Code reviews in gerrit, tests run by jenkins, hosting by AWS deployed using terraform and ansible. All that jazz.

E-mail in profile.
